title: Configuring the blog
text: On this post I keep a record of all the steps needed to configure/publish the blog

title: Configuring the blog
text:
Publishing to github-pages
I follow the steps described in the Publish command section of the Github pages part of the quarto documentation.
In order to use quarto publish from the command line I create a Personal Access token using the instructions here

title: Configuring the blog
text:
Adding custom domain
We configure only the main .github.io repository with a custom domain in Github as explained in the guide Managing a custom domain for your GitHub Pages site
The guide states that you must only configure a CNAME in the DNS settings but it was necessary to add four A Record as explained in the configuring an apex domain section of the same page.

title: Creating the website
text:
I decided to use the Bootstrap 5 framework. As a reference I am using:
